import{createAction}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export var fetchTokenList={pending:createAction('lists/fetchTokenList/pending'),fulfilled:createAction('lists/fetchTokenList/fulfilled'),rejected:createAction('lists/fetchTokenList/rejected')};// add and remove from list options
